protein.specific_function: May play a role in allowing polymerase epsilon to carry out its replication and/or repair function.

reference.reference_text: Li Y, Pursell ZF, Linn S: Identification and cloning of two histone fold motif-containing subunits of HeLa DNA polymerase epsilon. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jul 28;275(30):23247-52.
